tasks.task: Assemble a drip irrigation system for a garden.
subtasks: Identify components of the drip irrigation system.
Connect the system to a water hose faucet.
Install a battery timer for the irrigation system.
Adapt the system for different garden types (vegetable garden, raised bed, container pots).

tasks.task: Operate the battery timer for the drip irrigation system.
Troubleshoot common issues with the drip irrigation system.
subtasks: Adjust the timer settings as needed.
